external_games.name: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter - Legend of the Beast DLC

name: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter - Legend of the Beast
summary: Grab a fistful of rockets and step into the bright red shoes of the legendary Sam "Serious" Stone as he reloads for an all-new battle against the nefarious minions of Lord Mental. Hunt down the mysterious ram-god of the Great Obelisk and unlock the secrets buried beneath the mystical temples dotting the sands of ancient Egypt.
